# Reference

<!-- DO NOT EDIT: This document was generated by Puppet Strings -->

## Table of Contents

### Classes

-   [`external_facts`](#external_facts): Configure external_facts

### Defined types

-   [`external_facts::fact`](#external_factsfact): Set external facts
-   [`external_facts::script`](#external_factsscript): Manage external fact scripts

## Classes

### <a name="external_facts"></a>`external_facts`

Defines an external fact directory structure and management policy
and must be included in a catalog to use external_facts::fact

Optionally, automatically configures external facts by setting the hiera
structure of external_facts::external_facts

#### Examples

#####

```puppet
include ::external_facts
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `external_facts` class:

-   [`facter_basedir`](#facter_basedir)
-   [`facts_dir`](#facts_dir)
-   [`external_facts`](#external_facts)
-   [`scripts`](#scripts)

##### <a name="facter_basedir"></a>`facter_basedir`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`

Sets the base directory for where facter looks for external facts
(default: /etc/puppetlabs/facter)

##### <a name="facts_dir"></a>`facts_dir`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`

Sets the subdirectory for where facts are loaded from
(default: "{lookup('external_facts::facter_basedir')}/facts.d)

##### <a name="external_facts"></a>`external_facts`

Data type: `Hash[String, Struct[{value => Variant[Boolean, String]}]]`

A hash merged hash of facts to set as either boolean, or strings
(default: {})

##### <a name="scripts"></a>`scripts`

Data type: `Hash[String, Struct[{ content => Optional[String], source => Optional[Stdlib::Filesource], }]]`

A hash merged hash of scripts to push out
(default: {})

## Defined types

### <a name="external_factsfact"></a>`external_facts::fact`

Defines an external fact which will be available for use in your manifests
next puppet run

#### Examples

#####

```puppet
external_facts::fact { 'servicegroups':
  value => 'http,https',
}
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `external_facts::fact` defined type:

-   [`value`](#value)

##### <a name="value"></a>`value`

Data type: `Variant[Boolean, String]`

The value of the fact being set (default: true)

Default value: `true`

### <a name="external_factsscript"></a>`external_facts::script`

Provide an easy mechanism for putting external fact scripts into place

#### Examples

#####

```puppet
external_facts::script { 'facts.sh':
  source  => 'puppet:///modules/profile/facts/facts.sh',
}
```

#####

```puppet
external_facts::script { 'facts.sh':
  content =>  '#!/bin/bash
    echo FOO=BAR
  ',
}
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `external_facts::script` defined type:

-   [`content`](#content)
-   [`source`](#source)

##### <a name="content"></a>`content`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

The content that should be put into the script file. Conflicts with source
parameter.

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="source"></a>`source`

Data type: `Optional[Stdlib::Filesource]`

A filesource URL to be used for the content of the file to be placed.
Conflicts with the content parameter

Default value: `undef`
